levelList.name: Elongating Palm
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 (sum of this unit's [Breath] Potency and target's [Burst] Potency) (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count

levelList.name: Puncturing Serpent Arm
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 8 ([Breath] on self + [Burst] on target) (max 3)

levelList.name: Serpent's Concealed Puncture
levelList.desc:
If this unit has [SnakeStance] and target has [BurstPoison], this Skill becomes an Unclashable Skill
Coin Power +1 for every 4 ([Breath] on self + [Burst] on target) (max 10)
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count and gain +2 [Breath] Count

coindescs.desc: Deal +25% damage for every [SnakeStance] on self (max 50%)
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume 3 [BurstPoison] for every [SnakeStance] on self (max 5 per turn)

levelList.name: Eyeing for a Chance
levelList.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 [Burst] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [SnakeStance] (once per Skill)

[WinDuel] Gain +2 [Breath] Count

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] If this unit has [SnakeStance], Reuse this Coin once (once per Skill)

levelList.name: Mutated Elongating Arm
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 10 ([Breath] on self + [Burst] on target) (max 2)
[WinDuel] Gain +3 [Breath] Count

coindescs.desc: [CriticalOnSucceedAttack] If this unit has 10+ [Breath], gain 1 [SnakeStance] and Reuse Coin once (once per Skill; can gain up to 2 [SnakeStance] per turn)

levelList.name: Elongating Serpent Arm
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 8 ([Breath] on self + [Burst] on target) (max 3)
[BeforeAttack] If this unit has [SnakeStance], gain +2 Atk Weight
- Becomes a [WideAreaRampage] Skill
- When attacking the same target, if target has 2 or fewer [Burst] Count, inflict +1 [Burst] Count and consume 1 [BurstPoison]
[WinDuel] Inflict +1 [Burst] Count on all targets

levelList.name: Serpent's Keenlance
levelList.desc:
If this unit has [SnakeStance] and target has [BurstPoison], this Skill becomes an Unclashable Skill
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 4 ([Breath] on self + [Burst] on target) (max 10)
[WinDuel] Inflict +2 [Burst] Count and gain +3 [Breath] Count

coindescs.desc: If this unit has [SnakeStance], deal +100% damage
[OnSucceedAttack] Consume 5 [BurstPoison] for every [SnakeStance] on self (once per turn)
